section.p: You can take the crewmen exploring with you or leave them here to gather supplies. If you decide to take the men, get the codeword Cosy.

You stroll through light woodland and emerge on a level plain. The grass is as neatly mown as a lawn. Bees hum drowsily between the flowers. A paved avenue, lined on either side by stone slabs, stretches off across the plain towards grey cliffs in the distance.
